name: Underworld Capital Incident
storyline: Kirishima, an underworld escort, is tasked by his superior Rokkaku to capture the deceased one, Maki, who his fellow escort Kinoshita had disappeared while pursuing. He heads to a deserted school on Mukaimachi street where the deceased one was sighted, and begins his pursuit.
summary: Kirishima, an underworld escort, is tasked by his superior Rokkaku to capture the deceased one, Maki, who his fellow escort Kinoshita had disappeared while pursuing. He heads to a deserted school on Mukaimachi street where the deceased one was sighted, and begins his pursuit.
